info.name: AOL Mail Dark Black (-DestructiveBurn-)
info.description:
It's back! Want the Black banner? In the mail click Options at the top right and click Mail Themes in the drop down menu. Select the black banner or the flame one looks good too!
-------------------------------------- SUPPORT MY THEMES BY DONATING DONATE NOW --------------------------------------
